name: Lucid Dreamer
description:
I am currently calling the game "Lucid Dreamer" although the title may change.

In the game the player lives a normal life during the day working, socializing, shopping.

At night we get to enter into the players dreams and as a young man they almost always involve women. The player soon discovers they have the ability to alter their dreams to make things happen that normally wouldn't. It's up to the player to decide how to use this new found power.

As you progress through the game you will gain stats and unlock new events and areas to explore.

You will experience different fantasies played out through series' of dreams with a number of different characters.

The game is being designed in a way that allows easy access to an assortment of scenes while rewarding good players with extra content quicker than those who decide to explore.
